page.title: 14NEWCHURCH
page.content:
Newchurch as seen through the eyes of a 9 year old girl.
Newchurch is pretty,Newchurch is sweet Newchurch has only one little street.
Newchurch is pretty,Newchurch is sweet Newchurch is kept so beautifully neat.
Newchurch is pretty,Newchurch is sweet The people are so friendly to meet.
Newchurch is pretty,Newchurch is sweet In the churchyard there's an old wooden seat.
Newchurch is pretty,Newchurch is sweet To see the village school is a treat.
Newchurch is pretty,Newchurch is sweet The Post Office is haunted by the patter of feet.
